biogHist.abstract: The collection held by Connections UnitingCare's Adoption Information Service dates from around 1910. It includes records of the Methodist Babies' Home, Presbyterian Babies Home', Presbyterian Sisterhood, Fairfield Girls' Memorial Home, Canterbury Family Centre, Copelen Street and Connections UnitingCare. The types of records include admission books, adoption registers, client files, medical cards, and photographs.
biogHist.p: Connections UnitingCare's Adoption Information Service enables adopted persons, adoptive parents, parents who have relinquished their child and other family members to obtain information about an adoption. It also provides access to records to former Wards of State and Forgotten Australians who spent time in children's Homes run by its predecessor organisations.
Please note that the Adoption Information Service does not have records from Kildonan or any Kildonan services.

list.item:
Admission books 1929-1971
Contains: child's original name, date of birth, hospital where born, admission date, birthparent's names, ages and addresses where available, adoptive parents' names and addresses, placement date, date of adoption order.

Adoption books 1929-1971
A-Z Directory of adoptive parents. Contains: Adoptive parent's names and address; child's original name, date of birth, placement date, date of adoption order.

Register of adoptions and admissions 1929-1966
Contains: Child's original name, date of birth, admission date, discharge date, adoptive parents' surname, date of adoption order.

Masterbook 1952-1971
Monthly listing of admissions, discharges, placements and adoption orders granted. Contains: Child's original name, admission date, placement date, adoptive parents' names and addresses.

Admission slips 1959-1968
Birth mother admission slips. Contains: Child's original name, date of birth, hospital where born, birth mother's name, birth father's name, birthmother's parents' names, birthparents' religion, qualitative remarks about the birthparents and appearance of the child.

Children's birth details 1931-1940, 1965-1966
Contains: child's original name, child's date of birth, child's birth details including weight and length.

Summary of admissions 1929-1974
Contains: child's original name, date of birth, place of birth, admission date, baby's condition on entry including weight, birth mother's religion.

Child medical cards 1929-1974
Medical information on the birth of all babies admitted to the Methodist Babies Home 1929-1972. Contains: child's alias used by the nurses at the Methodist Babies Home, child's date of birth, limited medical information on birth parents.
Photographs c.1930s

Record of admissions 1928-1972
Contains: child's original name, age when admitted, birthplace, birthparents' names, birthparents' address, admission date, discharge date, child's destination upon leaving Presbyterian Babies Home (e.g. If returned to birthparents or adopted).

Particulars of new babies 1955-1976
Contains: child's original name, date of birth, time of birth, hospital where born, weight at birth, birth mother's full name, discharge date, some dates of adoption order and surnames of adoptive parents.

Intake registers 1965-1979
Contains: date of admission, birth mother's name, birth mother's marital status, birth mother's town of residence, who referred by.

Adoption book 1961-1971
Contains: adoptive parent's names, town of residence, religion, occupations, age of adoptive parents, reason for requesting a child, adoptee's name, date of placement.

Admission book 1953-1976
Contains: birth mother's name, birth fathers name, child's original name, child's date of birth and birth place, admission date, birth mothers address, reason for admission.

Case book 1961-1971
Contains: adoptive parent's names, town of residence, religion, occupations, age of adoptive parents, reason for requesting a child, adoptee's name, date of placement.

Foster care and adoption applicant register 1948-1971
Contains: birth mother's name, birth fathers name, child's original name, child's date of birth and birth place, admission date, birth mothers address, reason for admission.

Record of State Wards 1957-1976
Contains: child's ward number, child's name and gender, child's date of birth, admission and discharge date, some birth parents' names and addresses, where discharged to

Record of infants admitted 1966-1976
Contains: Child's original name, Child's date of birth, date of admission, adoptive parents' surname, date of adoption order.

Record of adoptions 1971-1974
Contains: Child's original name, child's date of birth, hospital where born, admission date, discharge date, monthly list of adoptions.

Discharge documents 1961-1969
Alphabetised birth mother patient records. Contains: birth mother's medical information including blood type, birth mother's date of birth, child's date of birth, birth mother's date of discharge, child's destination upon leaving Presbyterian Babies Home (e.g. If returned to birthparents or adopted.

Visitors book 1928-1969
Contains: names and addresses of visitors

List of nurses 1928-1952
Contains: Full name of nurse, address, age, religion, educational attainment, commenced and finished dates, status of examinations, who they reports to, certificate and badge.

Ledger of payments 1956-1973
Contains: date of payment, batch number assigned, surname of payer, date paid to, amount paid.

Photo album 1974-1975
A former mothercraft nurse who trained at the Presbyterian Babies' Home has deposited copies of images from her private photo album at Connections UnitingCare. There are pictures of children, staff and buildings - some of the children are identified.

Admission books 1910-1975
Contains: birth mother's name, age and admission date. Child's original name and date of birth.

Register of girls and babies in residence 1933-1976
Contains: yearly and monthly list of mothers in residence and babies born, birth mother's name and admission date, child's original name and date of birth, duration of stay in the Sisterhood, destination of birth mother after leaving Sisterhood, destination of child after leaving Sisterhood, date of adoption order.

Record of mothers and babies 1953-1967
Contains: child's original name, child's time and date of birth, place of birth, birth mother's name and age, child's birth weight, delivering doctor, date of discharge, days in hospital, destination of child after leaving Sisterhood (e.g. Returned to birthmother, to adoptive parents, made ward of the state), destination of birth mother after leaving Sisterhood, adoptive parents' names, placement date.

Mary Dickens Wing case books 1953-1970
Contains: birth mother's details, labour details, baby's gender and date of birth, medication administered.
Admission forms 1952 - Contains: birth mother's name, address, date of admission, date of birth, place of birth, marital status, religion.
Client files 1979-2000
Client files 1979-1995
Adoption and Permanent Care client files 2000-present

biogHist.p: Connections UnitingCare's Adoption Information Service has an in-house developed database which can be searched using a number of parameters including names, date of birth, and admission/discharge dates. Scanned images of the records in the collection are stored on the organisation's server and attached to the relevant case files directly within the database.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Adoption Information Service, Connections UnitingCare - Contact Details

Resource Section: The importance of photos
